programme.desc: Alien Energy: From military radar to Navy aircraft, sightings of Unidentified Aerial Phenomena have become more frequent - leading to unprecedented acceptance of alien contact. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Black Knight: Is the satellite in Earth's orbit that astronauts discovered in 1998 the same one that Nikola Tesla detected back in 1899? (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Sailing Stones, Brown Mountain Lights, Super Human Runner: A look at Death Valley boulders, mysterious dancing lights and super-marathon runners. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Ashley vs Rich: Ashley is not happy when Rich invades her territory in the shop and a pawn shop customer is caught abusing his girlfriend. (S4, ep 9)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Aliens And The Red Planet: Experts question what probes on Mars may have found over the past 40 years. Could NASA be hiding proof of life on the Red Planet from the public? (S6, ep 8)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Shamans: Throughout history, spiritual leaders known as shamans have healed, protected and advised. Could they really be in contact with extraterrestrial realms? (S6, ep 9)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: New. Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 26)

programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 80)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole, Allen Millyard and Guy Willison try to find vintage finds to sell in Kempton. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Winners Of The Centuries: Englishman David Kay shows up at auctions in Fort Worth. Victor finds spy gear and Ricky and Bubba set their sights on something big and dangerous. (S5, ep 8)

programme.title: Pawn Stars 22
programme.desc: The Prince of Pawn: When a painting by Prince pops into the Pawn Shop, is it time to party like it's 1999, or will we hear what it sounds like when Rick cries?

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Total Meltdown: Les delivers some devastating news to the family. Meanwhile, Seth and Ashley scramble to put together an event to celebrate the 30th anniversary of the shop. (S4, ep 13)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Aftermath: Exploring the goings-on in the Gold family's huge Detroit pawn shop. Les shocks the others when he reveals plans to buy a new store. Is it a good idea? (S5, ep 1)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Final Decision: Les reveals to Seth and Ashley whether he'll buy the new pawn shop, but his decision has bigger consequences than anyone could imagine. (S5, ep 2)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Doorway: Do the doorways recently discovered on the surface of Mars lead to an existential lesson for our species? (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Final Dimension: According to physics, time travel is possible - so could these unidentified phenomena actually be us from the future? (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Beastly Howls, Holloman Air Force Base UFO, and the Cabin That Defies Gravity: How does a cabin seemingly defy gravity? And what is the origin of some frightening howls? (S4, ep 5)

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice

programme.title: Storage Hunters

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Once in a Lifetime: Big money brings out fierce competition at a rare high-stakes RV auction, before the contents of a locker spill out at our bidders' feet. (S2, ep 5)

programme.desc: Henry, Allen and Guy dig through Matt XX's cast-offs, finding a vintage Chopper and a 1950s motorised bicycle. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: Help Me Make It Through the Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back all night, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Morning Has Broken!
programme.desc: From the era of glam rock, new wave and disco, it's all the hits from just one decade - the 1970s! Platform boots and flares at the ready?

programme.title: Essentials! 70s Rock Groups
programme.desc: Turn it up loud for 2 hours of proper rock from the 70s - the decade that gave birth to Prog and Metal! Including Pink Floyd, Led Zeppelin, Black Sabbath, Alice Cooper, AC/DC and Queen.

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1979
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year of 'Moonraker', 'Alien' and 'The Muppet Movie', and when 24 million people saw Penelope Keith in 'To The Manor Born' on TV.

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1978
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Larry Grayson first shouted "Shut that door!" on The Generation Game, and Ted Rogers rolled out his robotic dustbin on 3-2-1.

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1977
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Demis Roussos soundtracked Abigail's Party. Punk was the new scourge of society, but it was outsold by TV cop crooner David Soul!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of heatwave hits & headlines from a year of contrasts - Punk, Dancing Queen, the Inter-City 125, the Honey Monster & that year's top toy - Swingball!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Margaret Thatcher became Tory leader, Ding-a-Dong won Eurovision, and Fawlty Towers opened its doors for the very first time!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes from the year Richard Nixon left the US Presidency after Watergate, Prog Rock dominated the album charts & inflation hit double digits. Imagine that!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1973
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits and headlines served with a side order of flares! It was a busy year for the Queen as she opened the Sydney Opera House and the new London Bridge.

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1972
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from a year of major cultural debuts - Jesus Christ Superstar, Are You Being Served? and George, Zippy & Bungle in Rainbow!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1971
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Gary Barlow, David Tennant and Clare Balding were born. And the UK said goodbye to pounds, shillings & pence as we went decimal!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1970
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits & headlines from a year of firsts - 18 year olds were allowed to vote in the UK, Hawaii Five-O arrived on the TV & the 747 Jumbo launched from Heathrow!

programme.desc: Bear Game: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. The events displayed in the squares that the players land on come true in real life. (S1 Ep71)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Ranger Lemming: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. (S1 Ep72)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: An Egg-stremely Bad Idea: Hoping to 'brighten her day,' Izzy and Owen revamp Gwen's egg chair. (S2 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Exercising The Demons: When a severe screen addiction makes the kids lazy, Chef brings in a professional to whip them into shape. (S2 Ep6)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Pudding The Planet First: After Chef says opposing viewpoints make the world more interesting and fun, Izzy applies it in the worst way possible. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Supply Mum: When Chef's mum becomes the supply teacher for a day, Duncan replaces Chef's to-do list with one of his own. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Mooshy Mon Mons: After eating Chef's extremely rare and expensive chocolates, Courtney drags Owen, Izzy and Beth all the way to the Norberian Alps of Fruffenberg to replace them. (S2 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Student Becomes The Teacher: Chef is knocked unconscious right before a school board evaluator shows up for a big review. Now Owen has to fill in so Chef doesn't lose his teaching licence. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Beth And The Beanstalk: After having a chocolate bar confiscated by Chef, Beth finds herself in a parallel giant world and aims to get back her now giant chocolate bar. (S2 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The A-bok-bok-bokalypse: When chicken pox sweeps through the school, the kids visit the Chicken Queen to apologise for past misdeeds and hopefully procure an antidote before it's too late! (S2 Ep12)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Extreme Fitness: In order to woo the she-bear he's infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and get into shape with the ranger's bodybuilding equipment. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Domestic Robots: Grizzy discovers that the ranger's new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages, but the lemmings see the new gadget more as competition... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Itch: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied dance the lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, it's panic all round! (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Team Jay
programme.desc: Eat the Frog / Lost in Art: It's a busy day for Team Jay - they all have very important things to do and are anxious about how it's going to go! (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Team Jay
programme.desc: Project Blackout / Meena Girls: At the annual Supervillains Workshop and Conference, Hannibal proposes an alliance of the Forces of Darkness to pull off their most high-profile heist ever! (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Ghost Town: The Mermicornos stumble across an eerie ghost town, where there's a shocking revelation about Gwen's past - and her present. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Gang Of Secrets: Marinette's friends get akumatized into the Gang of Secrets, a team of supervillains determined to save her... whether she wants it or not! (S4 Ep3)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Talk: The Crimson Lord uses a Shard-embedded megaphone to steal voices, including L.J.'s. Mute before she's in the suit, Jade plays videos of herself training. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Breaking Bite: Beth becomes the big dog on campus after she bites Duncan, but being the big dog is a dangerous thing, especially when you didn't actually bite anybody! (S3 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: I Dream of Meanie: When Cody keeps screaming in his sleep, Gwen and Duncan take a trip into Cody's dreams to see what is scaring him. (S3 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Squirrels Squirrels Squirrels: Courtney's attempt to make Chef a better teacher fails when a squirrel gets his hands on her mind-control device. (S3 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Say Hello to My Little Friends: After telling the kids he will not miss them over the long weekend, Chef locks himself into the school and finds out he was very, very wrong. (S3 Ep12)

programme.title: The Inbestigators

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...

programme.title: Pokmon Master Journeys: The Series

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi yn poeni nad ydy e'n dda iawn am fod yn ddraig. Dydy e ddim yn gallu hedfan nac anadlu tn fel Gruffudd Goch. Digbi is worried he's no good at being a dragon.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pam bod pengwiniaid ddim yn gallu hedfan? Dyma cwestiwn Ela i Tad-cu heddiw. 'Why can't Penguins fly?' is the question Ela asks Tad-cu today.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Bethan yn penderfynu creu casgliad o rywbeth ond mae methu'n ln phenderfynu beth i'w gasglu. Bethan decides to start up her own collection, but can't decide what to collect.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa, and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: New: Yr Whws

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae tuk tuk Magi'n rasio'n ddi-yrrwr drwy'r pentre', a Sin yn ceisio ei ddal a diogelu'r bresych. Sin tries to stop a run-away tuk tuk and save the cabbages he needs for tonight's menu.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Dilys ar ras yn ceisio cael Norman i'r Ganolfan Weithgareddau Mynydd er mwyn hedfan yn Walabi 2. Dilys rushes to get Norman to the Mountain Activities Centre in time to fly in Walabi 2.

programme.title: Octonots

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Yn siop chips Gareth yr orangwtan, mae'r peiriant chips wedi torri. Mae Harri'n trio helpu Elsie i'w drwsio, ond ma'r radio'n diffodd! The fryer is broken at Gareth the orangutan's chippie!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Does dim awydd 'cysgu bach' ar Seren Fach heddiw. Tybed a all Haul ac Enfys ei berswadio i gau ei llygaid? Seren Fach has no interest in going to sleep tonight!

programme.title: Digbi Draig

programme.title: Murphy's Law
programme.desc: 1986. Action. Directed by J. Lee Thompson. Stars Charles Bronson, Kathleen Wilhoite & Carrie Snodgress. A hardboiled LAPD cop must go on the run after being framed for the murder of his ex-wife. [S]

programme.title: The Spiritualist
programme.desc: 1948. Thriller. Director: Bernard Vorhaus. Stars Turhan Bey, Lynn Bari & Cathy O'Donnell. Christine thinks she can hear her late husband calling out of the surf on the beach one night. [S]

programme.title: Beyond The Truth
programme.desc: The Real Men In Black. A documentary about The allegations that the US government is working with an alien intelligence to genetically mutate humans is investigated. (S1, E05)

programme.title: Tell Me Another
programme.desc: Disasters, Humiliations & Embarrassing Moments In Their Personal & Professional Lives. 1976. Personal anecdotes as told to Dick Hills. This episode stars Diana Dors, Jimmy Jewel and Ted Ray. [S]

programme.title: Ticket To Paradise
programme.desc: 1961. Romance. Director: Francis Searle. Stars: Emrys Jones, Patricia Dainton & Denis Shaw. The film tells the story of romance between a travel agent and a tourist on holiday in Italy. [S]

programme.title: Beyond the Curtain
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Directed by Compton Bennett. Starring Richard Greene, Eva Bartok and Marius Goring. East German refugee Karen finds herself back at home when the flight she works on is forced down. [S]

programme.title: A Touch Of The Sun
programme.desc: 1956. Comedy. In London's swanky hotel the Royal Connaught, if you need anything ask for Mr. Darling (Frankie Howerd) the ' Mr. Fix-it'. Stars: Ruby Murray, Alfie Bass & Dennis Price. [S]

programme.title: Lunch Hour
programme.desc: 1961. Comedy. Shirley Anne Field gives a great performance as a young designer on the brink of an affair with a married executive (Robert Stephens) at the company she works for. Stars Kay Walsh. [S]

programme.title: Carry On Spying
programme.desc: 1964. Comedy. Directed by Gerald Thomas. Stars Kenneth Williams, Barbara Windsor & Bernard Cribbins. A British spy and his pupils are sent to track down a stolen top secret chemical formula. [S]

programme.title: Up In The World
programme.desc: 1956. Comedy. Director: John Paddy Carstairs. Stars Norman Wisdom, Maureen Swanson & Jerry Desmonde. A window cleaner works at a country estate where the owner's son is threatened by kidnappers. [S]

programme.title: The Long & The Short & The Tall
programme.desc: 1961. War. Directed by Leslie Norman. Stars Richard Todd, Laurence Harvey & Richard Harris. Based on the Willis Hall play. A British patrol in Burma are determined to avenge British prisoners. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: Solo For Sparrow. 1962. Directed by Gordon Flemyng. Stars Anthony Newlands, Glyn Houston & Michael Coles. A gang of thieves get caught up in a murder whilst trying to rob a jewellery store. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: Odds On Murder. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley, Lisa Daniely & Bill Owen. Agent Smith investigates a threat to the life of jockey Tim Stout shortly before an important race. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Spell of Tut. 1966. Stars Adam West, Victor Buono & Marianna Hill. Batman and Robin battle the nefarious King Tut who plots to take over Gotham City with an ancient potion. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Special Edition. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Richard Bennet & Donald Bisset. A gang of career criminals believe they have the perfect alibi when they carry out a payroll robbery in Fleet Street. [S]
